title: Pax jax
body: Will pax jax ever be available again? I would pay anything for that skin<3. I jus dont quite understand why the pax skins are not in store when alot of people would willingly pay for them.

replies.body:
Hi there! 

There is currently no way to obtain this particular skin, and it's not a skin we're looking to bring back in the foreseeable future.
go onto a site called mk lol it gives u skins. well it doesn't give u skins literally because u dont own it u can only play with it.
